bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2008 regarding appropriations to the Department of Executive Management, the Department of Revenue and Regulation, the Department of Game, Fish and Parks, the Department of Transportation, the Department of Education, the Board of Regents, the Department of Human Services, and the Department of Environment and Natural Resources.
keywords: Department of Environment and Natural Resources
Department of Game, Fish, and Parks

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2008 regarding appropriations to the Department of Executive Management, the Department of Game, Fish and Parks, the Department of Transportation, the Department of Education, the Board of Regents, the Department of Human Services, the Department of Environment and Natural Resources, and the Unified Judicial System. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 2 of chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF EXECUTIVE MANAGEMENT South Dakota Risk Pool Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$593,000" and insert "$643,000" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$4,016,355" and insert "$6,016,355" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 6 of chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF GAME, FISH AND PARKS Parks and Recreation Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$441,902" and insert "$925,265" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. That section 10 of chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION General Operations Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$86,842,230" and insert "$81,592,230" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 4. That section 11 of chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION Administration, Secretary of Education Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$337,286" and insert "$587,286" State Aid to General Education Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$308,704,345" and insert "$311,073,555" Technology in Schools Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$6,632,201" and insert "$9,586,641" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 5. That section 13 of chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS Regents System Office Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$7,732,715" and insert "$8,160,663" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 6. That section 16 of chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES Alcohol and Drug Abuse Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$474,939" and insert "$965,939" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 7. That section 17 of chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES Financial and Technical Assistance Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$595,998" and insert "$1,075,998" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 8. That section 19 of chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: UNIFIED JUDICIAL SYSTEM Unified Judicial System Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$80,670" and insert "$180,670" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$210,000" and insert "$285,000" Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 9. That chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Section 37. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund four hundred eighty- three thousand three hundred sixty-three dollars ($483,363) from the Custer State Park improvement fund for the payment of the Custer State Park improvement bond. Section 10. That chapter 25 of the 2007 Session Laws be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Section 38. The state treasurer shall transfer to the state general fund six hundred ninety- three thousand six hundred eighty-eight dollars ($693,688) from the Board of Regents for the payment of the critical deferred maintenance bond. Section 11. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2008 may be carried over to fiscal year 2009. Section 12. This Act is effective June 16, 2008.
